DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Study ABT-126 Stable Subjects With Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Subject sign informed consent ; Current diagnosis schizophrenia ; Clinically stable single secondgeneration ( atypical ) antipsychotic past 8 week ; Meets studyspecific criterion Positive Negative Syndrome Scale ( PANSS ) ; Females pregnant , breastfeed ; Females postmenopausal surgically sterile practice birth control ; Males surgically sterile agree sexually inactive use barrier method birth control Diagnosis schizoaffective disorder ; Diagnosis mental retardation ; Subject substance dependence disorder sustain remission least 1 year ; Acute psychosis hospitalization within past 6 month ; Bipolar disorder , manic episode , dementia , obsessivecompulsive disorder , druginduced psychosis current major depressive disorder ; Current clozapine treatment ; Suicidal ideation behavior ; BMI 39 great ; Relevant drug sensitivity allergy ; Positive hepatitis HIV test result ; positive urine screen drug abuse alcohol ; Recent clinically significant illness/infection surgery ; Recent blood product transfusion , donation loss 5 mL/kg blood ;
